articles.title: Star Wars X-Wing Model From The Movies Fetches Millions At Auction - IGN
articles.description: One of the only surviving X-Wing models used in Star Wars: A New Hope sold for millions at an auction on Monday.
articles.content:
Continuing the recent trend of props auctioning at huge prices, a model X-Wing used in Star Wars: A New Hope has sold at auction for $2.3 million.
